column3: I know you can’t stand to be in the same room as me, so I just thought I’d try and apologize over the phone
Look I never should have kissed your girlfriend, but I’m…
3, WXRK, K-Rock for our $1,000 daily challenge
What is the name of your roommate who is very, very sorry and would do anything…
Look everyone, it’s the spirit of Thanksgiving
So are things with you and Joey any better
I spent eight hours calling him last night, just trying to get him to talk to me
So you could probably really use one of those plug-in telephone headsets huh
Should we all expect Christmas gifts that can be stolen from your office
Speaking of Christmas, umm since Monica and I are starting a new business and have like no money, umm, this year maybe we could do secret Santa, and then we each only buy one gift
And-and there’s the added mystery of who gets who
I don’t know why I do that
Well, I’m gonna take a nap, turkey makes me sleepy
I know, but all that work you’re doing to get it ready, I just…
Hey, by any chance did either of pick uh Rachel for your secret Santa, ‘cause I wanna trade for her
Oh thank God you want her
Why do you want to get rid of her so badly
Because she exchanges every gift she ever gets, it’s like impossible to get her something she likes
I got her that backpack and she loved it
I remember how much she was crying the day when that big dog ran off with it…  Oh, there was no big dog
I already got her this briefcase, and I had R
Well, maybe you could give to somebody else
Op, y'know what though, it’s kind’ve a girlie briefcase
The big game is about to start
You don’t have to do that, Ross and Joey aren’t here, you can watch the parade if you want
What is wrong with this freezer
Oh my God, ice just got in my eye
People are trying to sleep in here
Monica got ice in her eye, and it hurts
Open it up, let me see
Oh, y’know what, I can’t, it really kills
Well maybe you should put some ice on it
Honey, maybe we should take you to a doctor
No, my eye doctor is Richard
I can’t go to him when I don’t have a boyfriend
He’s really picky about his patients
Like I remember his office number
Yeah, I’m calling on behalf of Monica Geller’s eye, and is um, is Richard Burke in today
He’s out of town, but does she want to see the on-call doctor
This is so cool, ‘til Monica gets back, it’s like I’m head chef and I get to make all the decisions
Hey-hey, I thought she told you to follow the recipe exactly
Okay, get out of my kitchen
I think I am making some progress with Joey, when I went into the apartment he went straight into his bedroom but he only slammed the door once
I mean yeah, he gave me the finger while doing it
All right I… I gotta call my mom and ask her a left handed cooking question
So listen ah, I picked Monica for secret Santa, but I’m already getting her something for Chanukah, I was wondering if you wanna switch
Oh y’know what, I was already trying to trade for ah, well, you
That’s-that’s so nice, what are you gonna get me
, I was thinking something girlie for your office
Yeah, well maybe Phoebe will switch with me
Oh no-no-no, you don’t want to do that, then you’re gonna get stuck with Rachel and she exchanges every gift she ever gets
I’ve got her lots of stuff she never took back
Like uh, that gold necklace I got her last year
When was the last time you saw her wear it
Well, she wore it all Christmas day, and then uh…
I’m sending back all this stuff that Chandler bought out of guilt
I’m putting that in my room
Listen, Joey, I know what he did was wrong but don’t you think you could at least hear the guy out
Back when you and Rachel were together, if Chandler had kissed her, would you hear him out
So uh, how long are you gonna punish him
Don’t do the crime if you can’t do the time
Joey, the guy’s your best friend
Anyway, I don’t know why you’re pushing for him so hard
With him out of the way as my best friend, there’s a spot open
And y’know what I’m gonna do as my first act as your best friend
I’m gonna get you to talk to Chandler
But if you weren’t my best friend
Oh my God, is it really that bad
I walk into a room and he won’t even talk to me, he just mumbles something in Italian
And I know he only knows the bad words
Hey Gunther, have you uh, have you seen Chandler
But umm, one of who is over there
How cute is the on-call doctor
Ooh, so cute, that I’m thinking about jamming this pen in my eye
The-the on-call doctor will see me now
Richard Burke is out of town
Timothy Burke, his son, will see you now
Oh, uh, when-when are you coming back
I might stay there for a few days while I look for an apartment
Yeah, y’know at first I thought we could talk about this y’know, work it out, but uh, seeing you two together I don’t think I…
Hey, look, what do you want me to say
Do you want me to say that I’ll stop seeing her
But seeing you two together just reminds me of what you did
And I don’t want to live with some one who doesn’t know what it is to be a friend
Hey, look, I know what it is to be a friend, I just-I just screwed up
All right look, if you’re not gonna stay for me, then at least stay for them
Okay, they have had a very difficult year
What with the robbery and all
When that guy was robbing us, and I was locked in the entertainment unit for like six hours, you know what I was doing in there all that time
I was thinking about how I let you down
But if would’ve know what kind of friend you were gonna turn out to be, I wouldn’t have worried about it so much
There has to be something that I can do
If we still had that entertainment unit I would get in it for six hours and think about how I let you down
Last time I saw you, it was the morning I left for college
And you were just standing outside The Dairy Queen
I was probably waiting for it to open
I gotta tell you, you look great now
Well, you’ve got a little scratch on your cornea, your gonna have to wear a patch for a couple of days
Umm, so how long have you been working with your dad
Come on, one of us had to mention him
I moved back here a couple of months ago
I was gonna have Thanksgiving at my girlfriend’s
She-she wasn’t ready for a serious commitment
So you made her walk the plank
You’re not wearing the patch yet
It’s like inviting Greek tragedy over for dinner
Hey, come on, Phoebe, you understand don’t you
Yeah, I can see where I’d be your best shot but, no
I’m sorry, but I think it’s twisted
Me going out with Richard’s son
Sounds like a really bad idea to me
Hey, y'know, Mon, if things wrong out between you and Richard’s son, you’d be able to tell your kids, that you slept with their grandfather
Judge all you want to but,  married a lesbian,  left a man at the altar,  fell in love with a gay ice dancer,  threw a girl’s wooden leg in a fire,  livin’ in a box
So now, what exactly is the point of the box
The meaning of the box is three fold
One , it gives me the time to think about what I did
Two , it proves how much I care about my friendship with Joey
Hey uh, you remember the necklace I gave you last year
I wear it all the time
The necklace I got you was gold, this one is silver
Huh, well maybe it uh, it changed
Well isn’t it better that I exchanged it for something that I enjoy and that I can get a lot of use out of
Or, I’d like to get store credit for that amount like ‘em
All right everybody, this turkey is ready
Okay, the towels are hanging next to the sink, and umm, you can use the fancy soap
I thought we were savin’ that for the Pope
Yeah, but Monica, do you actually want to be in a relationship where you can actually use the phrase, "That’s not how your dad used to do it
That doesn’t sound like thinking to me
Y’know I don’t think you should be talking at all in there
I think you’ve got to much thinking to do to be talking and making jokes
Ross, can you pass me the yams
Oh, and Joey’s got the mashed potatoes if you want to exchange them
What is the matter with you
There’s nothing the matter with me
See, I’m not completely devoid of sentiment, see I have feelings
You can’t tell, but I’m trying to break the tension by mooning you guys
If this is just a big joke to you, then forget about it, all right
And if it doesn’t mean anything to you, then you should get out of there, otherwise you’re just an idiot in a box
This means a lot to me
I want you to be my friend again
I swear, I won’t say another word tonight
So are you gonna start taking this thing seriously
That sounds like another word to me
Are you gonna take this seriously
Don’t say that I have no sentiment
This is a movie stub from our first date
This is an eggshell from the first time you made me breakfast in bed
This is from the museum from the first time we… were together
Okay, maybe I exchange gifts sometimes, but I keep the things that matter
I don’t know what to say, I’m sorry
Though, you’re not supposed to take these
It’s like a million years old, we, we actually, we had people looking for that
You-you have a very beautiful… eye
Y’know all my friends think this is weird
Y’know I-I thought it was gonna be weird, I mean I almost called and canceled, but it really isn’t
I mean it’s like me and your dad, that’s a totally separate thing
We’re just two people who find each other very attractive
No-no really, was-was that not okay
No-no-no that was good, it was, that was uh, that was a goood kiss…
Listen, I want you to know how sorry I am…
Chandler’s the one I’m mad at
Oh, he-he can’t talk right now
He’s just trying to show Joey how much he means to him
Well uh,  you not being able to talk may make this easier
Listen umm…  Listen I don’t wanna be someone who comes between two best friends
I just, I can’t stand seeing what this is doing to you guys, and I don’t wanna be the cause of that
So, I don’t think we can see each other anymore
I’m gonna go to my mom’s in Chicago, I’m gonna stay there for awhile
I think this could’ve be something really amazing, but y’know this is probably for the best
Come on, get out of there
Yeah, you did some real good thinkin’ in there
And Merry Christmas from you’re secret Santa
Oh, he’s catching up to her
I’m gonna go call the police
